subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A lower salary cap did not hamper the usual flurry of summer free-agent spending. In perhaps the most stunning move, Daniel Alfredsson left Ottawa to join Detroit.
snippet: A lower salary cap did not hamper the usual flurry of summer free-agent spending. In perhaps the most stunning move, Daniel Alfredsson left Ottawa to join Detroit.
